title.narrative: 003 RURAL Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH)

description.narrative: By 2025, Children and families in rural areas have equitable access to basic inclusive Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services, including in humanitarian situations., which contributes to Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 'By 2025 children and their families in rural and urban areas use safe, affordable and sustainable water, sanitation and practice appropriate hygiene
